sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>BTG </description>
        <name>Country Specific - 15 dec</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
	
	var request = g_form.getValue('request_type');
    var account_group = g_form.getValue('vendor_account_group');
	var country = g_form.getValue('country');
	
    if (request == 'creation') {//creation loop                                                                                                                                  //main loop for creation
        g_form.setDisplay('to_add_attachment', true);
        g_form.setDisplay('comments', true);
		

        if ((account_group == 'BTVE - External Trade' || account_group == 'BNTV - External Non-Trade' || account_group == 'BRFF - Freight & Logistics' || account_group == 'BINV - Intercompany')) {//account group loop                   //nested if 1
            g_form.setMandatory('vendor_md_request_general_information_creation', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('general_information', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('vendor_md_request_general_information_creation', true);
			g_form.setMandatory('name_1', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('name_1', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('name_2', true);
            g_form.setMandatory('address_1', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('address_1', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('address_2', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('address_3', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('district', true);
            g_form.setMandatory('postal_code', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('postal_code', true);
            g_form.setMandatory('city', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('city', true);
            g_form.setMandatory('u_country', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('u_country', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('region', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('general_telephone', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('exension', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('mobile', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('general_fax', true);
            g_form.setMandatory('general_email', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('general_email', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('general_email', true);
			g_form.setMandatory('mdm_contact_information',true);
			g_form.setDisplay('mdm_contact_information',true);
			g_form.setDisplay('business_reg_no', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('gst_vat_reg_no', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('customer_code', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('reconciliation_account', true);
            g_form.setMandatory('payment_term', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('payment_term', true);
            g_form.setMandatory('payment_method', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('payment_method', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('accounting_clerk', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('tolerance_group', true);
			g_form.setMandatory('po_currency', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('po_currency', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('incoterm_1', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('incoterm_2', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('gr_based_inv_verification', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('partner_function', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('code', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('name', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('purchases_text', true);
			g_form.setMandatory('po_currency', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('po_currency', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('incoterm_1', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('incoterm_2', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('gr_based_inv_verification', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('partner_function', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('code', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('name', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('purchases_text', true);
			g_form.setMandatory('personnel_number',false);
			g_form.setDisplay('personnel_number',false);
			
			
			
			
						if (country == 'Thailand') {                                                                     //nested if 2
							
							        g_form.setDisplay('bank_details_label',true);
									g_form.setDisplay('id_beneficiary_city_code', false);
									g_form.setDisplay('rec_type', true);
							        g_form.setMandatory('trading_partner', false);
							        g_form.setDisplay('trading_partner', false);
									g_form.setDisplay('cash_management_group', true);

									g_form.setDisplay('swift_code1', true);
							        g_form.setDisplay('geographic_info',true);

								}
								else if (country == 'Singapore') {
									g_form.setDisplay('bank_details_label',true);
